biotools.summary: Maps sequence variants to protein structures from the Protein Data Bank (PDB), and further to protein–protein, protein–nucleic acid, protein–compound, and protein–metal ion binding sites. Binding sites are defined by local structural comparisons of whole protein structures using the Protein Binding Sites (ProBiS) algorithm and transposition of ligands from the similar binding sites found to the query protein using the ProBiS-ligands approach
